## extension

<dfn>The end part of a file name that tells you what type of file it is (e.g., .R or .Rmd).</dfn>

Common file types and their extensions

| File type                 | extension   |
|:--------------------------|:------------|
| R script                  | .R          |
| R Markdown                | .Rmd        |
| Comma-separated variable  | .csv        |
| Plain text                | .txt        |
| Web file                  | .html       |
| Word document             | .doc, .docx |
| PDF                       | .pdf        |
